package ${tableInfo.dtoPackageName};

import java.io.Serializable;
#foreach(${domainImport} in ${tableInfo.entityImports})
import ${domainImport};
#end

/**
 * The dto of the table "${tableInfo.name}".
 * @author $!{author}
 */
public class ${tableInfo.dtoClassName} implements Serializable {
    /* Generated by artoria-extend in ${generatedTime}. */

    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

#foreach(${columnInfo} in ${tableInfo.columnInfoList})
    /**
     * $!{columnInfo.remarks}
     */
    private ${columnInfo.javaType} ${columnInfo.fieldName};
#end

#foreach(${columnInfo} in ${tableInfo.columnInfoList})
    public void ${columnInfo.setterName}(${columnInfo.javaType} ${columnInfo.fieldName}) {

        this.${columnInfo.fieldName} = ${columnInfo.fieldName};
    }
    public ${columnInfo.javaType} ${columnInfo.getterName}() {

        return this.${columnInfo.fieldName};
    }

#end

    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "${tableInfo.dtoClassName}{" +
#set($temp = 0)#foreach(${columnInfo} in ${tableInfo.columnInfoList})
                "#if($temp > 0), #end#set($temp = $temp + 1)${columnInfo.fieldName}='" + ${columnInfo.fieldName} + '\'' +
#end
                '}';
    }

}
